comments:
I tried to add the facet "JSF 1.2" to a web project via the properties dialog (imported from WAR file, web.xml is 2.5 but dynamic web module facet is 2.4). 
The WAR file can be found here: http://www.informatik.fh-wiesbaden.de/~knauf/SWTVertiefung2007/jsfbasics/JSF.war

This resulted in the error message "Failed while installing JavaServer Faces 1.2" (will attach a screenshot).
The faces-config.xml was created and the Faces servlet was registered in web.xml, but the facet was not installed.

Further attempts to register the JSF facet resulted in an error message "Duplicated jar on classpath: C:/temp/jboss-4.2.0.CR1/server/default/deploy/jboss-web.deployer/jsf-libs/jsf-api.jar" in the "JSF Capabilities" dialog.

Same happens if I declare the JSF runtime as "1.1" and try to add the "1.1" facet.

A valid JSF runtime (JSF 1.2 from JBoss 4.2.0CR1) was created before

With WTP 1.5.3, a similar error message occured, but the facet could be added in the second attempt, which is now broken !

Created an attachment (id=63661)
Error message while adding facet

Update: I found this exception in the log:

Seems it was not logged directly after the error occured but at a later moment.

I should add that the sample project linked in comment #1 already contains faces-config.xml and the entry to web.xml, so my comment was partially wrong (sorry !). Will try it with a clean non-JSF-WAR and come back to you again.

Hi,

I'm also getting the same error when I try to create a new dynamic web project with  following project facets:
Dynamic Web Module - 2.5
Java - 1.6
JSF - 1.2 (jsf-1.2_04-b07)
Server - Tomcat 6.0.10

The dynamic web project gets created, but no JSF related stuff (faces-config, jsf libraries, dependent libraries) are added to the project.

I'm not facing any kind of problem when creating a JSF 1.1 project.

An imported JavaEE5 EAR (Dynamic Web facet is 2.4, but web.xml is 2.5) without faces-config.xml also fails (from: http://www.informatik.fh-wiesbaden.de/~knauf/SWTVertiefung2007/stateless/Stateless.ear). "faces-config.xml" is created, but faces servlet is not added to web.xml, and the facet is not added.
The errors with JavaEE5 deployment descriptors are reported as bug #181593

With a 2.4 Dynamic Web project everything works fine, must be a matter of the 2.5 web.xml.

Verified against wtp-S-2.0RC1-200705230250, works fine now.

Thanks for fixing it !
